document.full_text: the 17-nation euro zone should consider establishing a central finance ministry as it tightens coordination of national economic policies to fight crises, the head of the bloc's central bank said on thursday.
document.title: trichet suggests finance ministry for euro zone
lines_and_colors: the 17-nation euro zone should consider establishing a central finance ministry as it tightens coordination of national economic policies to fight crises, the head of the bloc's central bank said on thursday.
